mapper.insert: insert into lodgement (lodgement_userNumber, lodgement_companyName, lodgement_location, lodgement_LatLng, lodgement_category, lodgement_hashTag, lodgement_img) values (#{lodgement_userNumber}, #{lodgement.lodgement_companyName}, #{lodgement.lodgement_location}, #{lodgement.lodgement_LatLng}, #{lodgement.lodgement_category}, #{lodgement.lodgement_hashTag} ,#{lodgement.lodgement_img})
mapper.select: select lodgement_number from lodgement where lodgement_userNumber=#{lodgement_userNumber} and lodgement_companyName=#{lodgement.lodgement_companyName} and lodgement_location=#{lodgement.lodgement_location}
mapper.insert: insert into information (information_number, information_type, information_notice, information_basicInfo, information_comment, information_addPeopleInfo, information_service, information_refundInfo) values (#{information_number}, 1, #{information.information_notice}, #{information.information_basicInfo}, #{information.information_comment}, #{information.information_addPeopleInfo}, #{information.information_service}, #{information.information_refundInfo})
